snippet: A customs official said that Sri Lanka had banned this week’s issue of Time magazine over its cover story on Myanmar’s sectarian violence between Buddhists and Muslims.
abstract: Sri Lanka bans weekly issue of Time magazine over its cover story on Myanmar’s sectarian violence between Buddhists and Muslims because it could affect religious sentiments in its country, which is mainly Buddhist.
lead_paragraph: A customs official said that Sri Lanka had banned this week’s issue of Time magazine over its cover story on Myanmar’s sectarian violence between Buddhists and Muslims.

headline.main: Sri Lanka: Time Magazine Is Banned
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Time Magazine Is Banned
